name: MSCRMUpdateWebResource
description: A task that updates Dynamics 365 web resources created using developer toolkit project
author: Wael Hamze

options.developerToolkit: Use developer toolkit Web Resource project file as mapping

inputs.name: webResourceProjectPath
inputs.label: Web Resource Project Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of web resources project created using developer toolkit

inputs.name: webResourceFolderPath
inputs.label: Web Resource Folder Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of folder contains web resources. File name are considered as unique name of web resource.

inputs.name: commaSeparatedWebResourceExtensions
inputs.label: Comma separated list of web resource extensions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of web resource extensions. E.g. *.html,*.htm,*.js,*.css,*.png,*.jpeg

inputs.name: regExToMatchUniqueName
inputs.label: Regular expression to match unique name of web resource
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular expression to match unique name of web resource. Please use $filename as placeholder to relate file name and unique name. E.g. new_.*?$fileName which will match string like new_/Script/test.js. Considering 'new_' is prefix of web resource and $fileName replaced dynamically.

inputs.name: includeFileExtensionForUniqueName
inputs.label: Include file extension to match unique name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include file extension to match file name and unique name.
